articles.title: AI hair washing debuts in Guangzhou city, priced at $2.59 per service
articles.author: Global Times
articles.summary: AI hair washing stores are launching in Guangzhou, offering fully automated hair washing services. The service, initially priced at 9.9 yuan, is now around 19 yuan ($2.59) on online platforms. These stores utilize AI-powered machines to conduct thorough scalp cleansing and offer customizable washing modes, addressing staffing shortages and providing a novel hair care experience.

articles.title: Baked bean ice cream please… with cheese on top! New flavours loved by Gen Z include soy sauce and custard
articles.author: LUCY HOLDEN
articles.summary: Anya Hindmarch in London's Belgravia launched a new range of unique ice cream flavors, attracting long queues of customers. Bears Ice Cream Imaginarium in Whitstable, Kent, introduced seasonal ice cream flavors like hot cross bun and scotch egg, along with innovative toppings and ice cream sandwiches. EasyJet served a range of bizarre ice cream flavors in Southend to mark the opening of a new airport.

articles.title: New Balance Is Releasing Loafers, And They Probably Shouldn't: Release Date & Info
articles.author: Kenyun Mazique
articles.summary: New Balance is launching a new product, the New Balance 1906L Loafer, which was unveiled at Paris Fashion Week. The loafer is scheduled for release on June 1, 2025, with a retail price of $160.

articles.title: Scouted: I Tried the Supermodel-Approved LYMA Skincare Starter Kit—Here Are My Thoughts
articles.summary: LYMA introduced its new Skincare Starter Kit consisting of a serum and cream powered by proprietary Genoclytic technology. The kit aims to revolutionize skincare by targeting concerns like fine lines, redness, and acne with its science-first approach. The product's efficacy even led to a delay in the user's regularly scheduled Botox appointment.

articles.title: Pope not expected to attend Good Friday event
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming through its KENS 5 app available on phones. Users can stream KENS 5 content using the app.

articles.title: Novi AI Introduces Ghibli-Style Video Generator – Turn Long-Form Stories into Emotional Animated Masterpieces
articles.author: i My Fone
articles.summary: iMyFone Novi AI launched a new Ghibli-style video generator. This feature transforms long-form narratives into emotionally rich, animated videos mimicking Studio Ghibli's style.

articles.title: The best essential oil diffusers will make your home smell like a luxury spa
articles.summary: The article highlights several essential oil diffusers available for 2025, including models from Vitruvi, Vivitest, Urpower, Innogear, Neom Pod Mini, Homedics SereneScent, Pura Plus, and Pura 4. These diffusers offer varied features like waterless operation, Bluetooth connectivity, customizable mist intensity, and app control, catering to different needs and room sizes. The review assesses design, performance, and special functionalities to guide consumers in choosing the best diffuser for their preferences.

articles.title: VRAM Pro: Allocate more GPU memory on your Mac (menubar utility)
articles.summary: An unspecified entity launched a macOS utility. This represents a new product introduction within the software category.

articles.title: Android 16 is finally expanding beyond Google Pixel phones
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: Google has started rolling out Android 16's fourth beta update, reaching platform stability. Multiple device brands, including Honor, iQOO, Lenovo, OnePlus, OPPO, Realme, Sharp, Vivo, and Xiaomi, are preparing beta updates based on the latest Android 16 build.

articles.title: This deal (robo) rocks: save 51% off the roborock Q8 Max+ Robot Vacuum and Mop
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Roborock is offering the Q8 Max+ Robot Vacuum and Mop with a 51% discount on Amazon. This robot vacuum features 5500Pa suction, a 770ml dustbin, a self-emptying dock, electronic mopping with 30 water flow levels, LiDAR navigation, obstacle avoidance, and smart home integration with Alexa, Google Home, and Siri.

articles.title: George Numatic GVE370 Wet and Dry Vacuum review: A high-performance hoover for pro cleans
articles.author: Ellie Davis
articles.summary: Henry hoovers introduced George, a wet and dry vacuum cleaner. George offers carpet cleaning alongside typical vacuuming, includes numerous attachments, and can unblock sinks and clean wet spillages. The product is bagged and uses HepaFlo bags.

articles.title: Deal of the Day: Blink Mini 2 is 50% off right now
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: Blink is offering a 50% discount on the Blink Mini 2, the latest version of their smart security camera. The Blink Mini 2 features a 143-degree field of view, color night vision, IP65 dust and water resistance, and integration with the Blink app for live video feeds, two-way audio, and motion detection notifications. With a Blink subscription, users gain access to additional features like cloud storage and person detection.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 updates: Pre-order date, price, games and everything else you need to know
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5 for $450. The console will feature a 1080p 7.9-inch display, magnetic Joy-Cons, and support up to 4K output when docked. Pre-orders in the US and Canada will start on April 24.

articles.title: Thesys Introduces C1 to Launch the Era of Generative UI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Thesys has launched C1, the world's first Generative UI API designed to transform LLM outputs into dynamic applications. Enterprises adopting C1 can experience accelerated product launches, optimized resource allocation, and measurable cost reductions. C1 is now available for general use.

articles.title: Thesys Introduces C1 to Launch the Era of Generative UI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Thesys has launched C1, the world's first Generative UI API designed to convert LLM outputs into dynamic applications in real time. C1 integrates with modern frameworks and languages, streamlining UI complexity and enabling faster product launches, optimized resource allocation, and cost reductions for enterprises building AI agents. It is now available for general use, with over 300 teams already utilizing Thesys tools.

articles.title: 27 Free People Products That Seem Too Beautiful To Be Under $100…And Yet
articles.author: Yi Yang
articles.summary: Free People introduces a variety of new clothing items and accessories. These include dresses, rompers, shoe charms, bralettes, and denim jackets designed for various occasions, from casual outings to special events. Prices and available sizes are provided for some products, offering consumers details about the new offerings.

articles.title: Second Fort Walton Beach ALDI location set to open on April 24
articles.author: NWF Daily News
articles.summary: ALDI opened a new supermarket in Bay County, celebrated with a ribbon-cutting ceremony on March 6. ALDI is also planning to open a new store in Fort Walton Beach, aiming to provide the lowest prices compared to other national grocers.

articles.title: The NuFace is like Botox without the regret — $35 off during the Walmart Beauty Sale
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: NuFACE Trinity Starter Kit, a microcurrent facial device, is currently on sale at Walmart. It stimulates facial muscles to tone, contour, and lift, includes the Trinity device, charging cradle, power adapter, and Hydrating Leave-On Gel Primer. Regular use can maintain results similar to lymphatic facials and improved sleep.

articles.title: Local 5 Top Stories: Week of April 13, 2025
articles.summary: The WeAreIowa app is required to stream WeAreIowa content on your phone, suggesting the app's role in accessing the service.

articles.title: LG's Integrated TV Ad Tech Analyzes Your Emotions
articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.summary: LG is integrating Zenapse's AI-powered emotional intelligence technology into its TVs to deliver targeted advertisements to webOS users. This multiyear licensing deal will allow LG to divide webOS users into specific market segments to improve ad relevance across LG smart TVs and FAST channels. LG will expand new software development and go-to-market products by using Zenapse's technology.

articles.title: 14 Best Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
articles.author: Julian Chokkattu
articles.summary: Nubia launched the Redmagic Nova Gaming Tablet featuring a 10.9-inch LCD screen and Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. OnePlus continues selling the OnePlus Pad with a 11.61-inch LCD 144-Hz display. Samsung released the Galaxy Tab S9 FE Plus, a "Fan Edition" version of the Tab S9 series.

articles.title: Still living with unsecured internet? Lock it down with NordVPN — just $3 a month
articles.summary: NordVPN is offering a promotional discount of 77% off their 2-year plan, plus three bonus months, reducing the monthly cost to $3.09. User reviews highlight NordVPN's versatility and fast server speeds for streaming on platforms like YouTube and Netflix, while also noting a potential reduction in internet speed due to encryption.

articles.title: New Dyson airwrap dupe due to land in Aldi Ireland middle aisle, here's exactly when you can bag it
articles.author: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland is launching a Brushless Motor Hairdryer for €34.99, a dupe for the Dyson Airwrap, featuring multiple speed and temperature settings, magnetic diffuser, and concentrator, along with a 3-year warranty. Additionally, the retailer will bring back the popular 5-in-1 Hairstyler for €79.99, equipped with ionic technology and five attachments. These items will be available in stores from May 1.

articles.title: Emma Hybrid Thermosync mattress review: A hybrid that won't leave you hot or bothered
articles.author: Jane Hoskyn
articles.summary: Emma renamed its NextGen Cooling mattress to Hybrid Thermosync in January 2025 and rebranded the NextGen Premium to Hybrid Premium. The Emma Hybrid Thermosync is a bed-in-a-box hybrid mattress designed with a Thermosync layer to regulate body temperature during sleep.  It retains less body heat than other mattresses.

articles.title: Electrolux Ultimate600 cordless vacuum review: Impressive suction and battery life, but skip it if you have pets
articles.author: Camryn Rabideau
articles.summary: Electrolux has released the Ultimate600, a new mid-priced cordless vacuum. The Ultimate600 offers strong suction, decent battery life, and multiple attachments in a lightweight design and is available in two versions: the standard Ultimate600 and the Ultimate600 Complete Home edition, which includes additional attachments.

articles.title: Panera Introduces First-Of-Its-Kind Croissant Toast Sandwiches
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Panera Bread has launched new Croissant Toast sandwiches, available in Croque Monsieur and Fromage varieties, as part of their spring lunch and dinner menu refresh. The menu also includes the introduction of the new Strawberry Chicken Caprese Salad.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Gets a Cool Dev Video
articles.author: Anthony Franklin II
articles.summary: FuturLab is releasing PowerWash Simulator 2, featuring enhancements like visible soap effects, online and split-screen co-op gameplay, and a customizable home base. The game includes a storyline cleverly hidden in the environment and text messages, adding depth to the power washing experience.

articles.title: New Look's new-in edit is perfect for summer
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: New Look has launched a new collection perfect for summer, featuring items like the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress (£29.99), Red Shirred Peplum Top (£18), White Pleated Midi Skirt (£29.99), Black Striped Crew Neck Waistcoat (£22.99), Black Crinkle Textured Striped Wide Leg Trousers (£29.99), Burgundy Creased Faux Leather Jacket (£45.99), and Blue Denim Tunic Dress (£39.99). The collection focuses on affordability, quality, and summer styling, with prices ranging from £18 to £45.99.

articles.title: 'Great bang for the buck': This waterproof speaker is down to $20, but not for long
articles.summary: BolaButty Bluetooth Speaker is promoted as a compact, portable, and water-resistant speaker currently available at Amazon for $20. The speaker boasts long battery life, built-in light effects, good sound quality with dual drivers, and can connect up to 100 feet away from a device, featuring in customer reviews with 17,000 five-star ratings.

articles.title: Skittles Asks Gen Z to 'Legally Acknowledge the Rainbow' for New Pop'd Candy
articles.author: Cydney Lee
articles.summary: Mars brand Skittles launched a new product called Skittles Pop'd, a freeze-dried version of its original chewy candy. The company released it in October 2024. Skittles promoted the new candy with an interactive social campaign on TikTok, Instagram, and Snapchat.

articles.title: 2025 Isuzu N Series truck review: Quick drive
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: Isuzu is launching a new-generation N Series truck with revised styling, new LED headlights, and a more car-like interior. Powertrain options are now Euro 6 compliant, and a nine-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission is available for 3.0-liter variants. Major safety technology upgrades include a new stereo camera setup, front cross-traffic alert, and adaptive cruise control.

articles.title: The Baja Blast Twist That Should Be On Taco Bell's Permanent Menu
articles.author: Dylan Murray
articles.summary: Taco Bell introduced the 'Dirty MTN Dew Baja Blast Dream Soda,' a creamy version of their popular Baja Blast drink. This menu item, initially called Baja Dream Freezes, now comes in standard and zero-sugar versions with a vanilla crème infusion. While currently a limited-time offering, the drink's popularity stems from a homemade trend, inspiring many to recreate it themselves.

articles.title: ‘Brilliant device' – Woodie's fans rushing to buy game-changing item to dry clothes in back garden for summer months
articles.author: Danielle Russell Masterson
articles.summary: Woodie's is offering the Brabantia Retractable Wallfix 24m Washing Line for €164.99, available online and in stores. Aldi Ireland launched a Video Doorbell for €22.99, which is water and dust resistant and includes features like high-resolution video, two-way audio, and motion detection.

articles.title: Netflix is revamping search with AI to improve discovery
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Netflix is developing a new AI-powered interactive search experience to improve title discovery. CEO Greg Peters announced the use of generative technologies to enable a more engaging search process.

articles.title: If Your Middle Name Is 'Prepared,' Then You Should Take A Gander At These 48 Seasonal Items
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: This compilation showcases a variety of products across beauty, health, home, and outdoor categories available on Amazon. Brands featured include Garnier Fructis with its Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum, Dr. Scholl's Roll-On Foot Pain Relief Liquid, Neutrogena's Dry-Touch SPF 70 Sunscreen, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, and Eos' Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, among many others. These products offer solutions ranging from frizz control to sun protection, and pain relief.

articles.title: 7 Best Luxury Laundry Detergents for Everyday Indulgence
articles.author: Annie Blackman
articles.summary: The Laundress introduced Signature Detergent with lily of the valley, musk, and sandalwood scents. Dedcool launched Milk Dedtergent, mirroring their Milk Eau de Parfum scent. Homecourt offers Laundry Concentrate in scents like Cece, while Blueland provides Laundry Detergent Starter Set in tablet form. Dr. Barbara Sturm offers fragrance-free Laundry Detergent, and Snif provides a Laundry Starter Pack featuring the Sweet Ash scent. Bath & Body Works also sells Moonlit Goddess Laundry Detergent which is a soft blend of lavender, pear blossom, and vanilla.

articles.title: This rugged Android is my pick for off-grid adventures - and it's on sale for $250
articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.summary: Blackview launched the BV7300, a ruggedized smartphone featuring a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS display, MediaTek Helio G81 chip, 6GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a massive 15,000mAh battery. The phone also includes a powerful 800-lumen flashlight and a night vision camera.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap ID Quick Review: Worth The Hype But.... 💁🏻‍♀️
articles.summary: Dyson's latest multi-styling tool, the Dyson Airwrap ID, is reviewed extensively for its performance, design, heat control, and ease of use. The review assesses whether the product justifies its premium price tag.

articles.title: Marijuana options expand with innovation
articles.author: John Frank
articles.summary: Flower Union developed a gummy with marijuana flower inside, allowing consumers to experience a flavor similar to smoking a joint without the smoke. Other companies are creating cannabis products specifically for non-smokers. These new products aim to boost sales and attract new consumers amid a challenging financial climate.

articles.title: Africa: MTN, Meta to Enhance Whatsapp Call Quality Across 12 African Countries
articles.summary: MTN Group has partnered with Meta to enhance voice and video call quality on WhatsApp across 12 MTN markets, starting in Nigeria.  This initiative focuses on optimising networks to deliver a seamless user experience. Early results in Nigeria show a 50% improvement in key performance indicators, leading to a better user experience for MTN Nigeria mobile users.

articles.title: 7 garment care essentials that will help extend the life of your clothing
articles.author: Nora Colomer
articles.summary: Laundress New York introduced mesh laundry bags and cashmere combs for delicate garment care. Conair launched the Turbo ExtremeSteam Handheld Fabric Steamer for wrinkle removal. Molly's Suds and Nellie's released wool dryer balls to soften fabrics and reduce drying time.

articles.title: EazyDTF Expands Capacity with Major Investment in Large Format DTF Printing Technology
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: EazyDTF is adding ten new DTF printers. This addition allows EazyDTF to offer nationwide same-day shipping and unmatched print quality.

articles.title: Android 15 officially rolled out but Google puts block on one key feature that could impact users
articles.author: Fionnuala Boyle
articles.summary: Google has rolled out Android 15 on select handsets, introducing new features such as Private Space for hiding sensitive apps, Theft Detection Lock for enhanced security, Saved app pairs for launching two apps side-by-side, and App Archiving to free up storage space.  Android 15 requires devices to have at least 32GB of storage and includes improvements like screen recorder alerts and a battery health percentage.
GoPro is offering a substantial Black Friday discount on its Hero 11 Black camera, significantly lowering the price for consumers.

articles.title: When is 1-inch not really 1-inch? How Vivo, Oppo, and Xiaomi are hard-selling smartphone cameras
articles.summary: Xiaomi's upcoming 15 Ultra will feature Sony's LYT-900 sensor, while Oppo's Find X8 Ultra will utilize the same sensor. Vivo's X200 Pro will use the relatively newer Sony LYT-818 sensor. The trend in flagship smartphones involves fitting larger sensors to improve camera performance, though the actual usable area and software optimization play crucial roles.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus : Unboxing & First Impression🖊️🔥💯
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Motorola has introduced the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, priced at Rs 22,999, featuring a built-in stylus, a 6.7-inch 1.5K pOLED display, Android 15, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2, 8GB+256GB, 50MP+13MP camera, and a 5,500mAh battery with 68W wired charging.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of Bosch high pressure washer with 'impressive performance' by 26%
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Amazon offers a discount on the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 high-pressure washer, reducing the price from £89.99 to £67. The washer features 110 bars of pressure, various nozzle attachments, and a detergent nozzle. Amazon also sells Karcher pressure washers, with upgraded Karcher models available at Argos.

articles.title: Why Yeti CEO Matt Reintjes is doubling down on bags
articles.author: Jeff Beer
articles.summary: Yeti, after acquiring Mystery Ranch, launched the Ranchero backpack in March. The Ranchero integrates Mystery Ranch design and signifies Yeti's expansion into becoming a bags brand instead of just a cooler brand that makes bags. This product launch aims to leverage both Mystery Ranch's expertise and Yeti's brand capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung A-Series enters new era of 'Awesome Intelligence' with AI-powered A26, A36, and A56
articles.author: Tracy-Lynn Ruiters
articles.summary: Samsung officially launched its new Galaxy A26 5G, A36 5G, and A56 5G smartphones in Johannesburg, introducing AI features to the A-Series. The new A-Series includes AI features such as Circle to Search, AI Music Detection, Action Chip, and AI Select to enhance the smartphone experience.

articles.title: Beiersdorf unveils new product
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Beiersdorf launched its dermatologist-recommended brand, Eucerin, in Nigeria. This launch signifies Beiersdorf's commitment to providing scientifically proven skincare designed for African skin.

articles.title: King Newswire rolls out enhanced distribution model to expand global media reach
articles.summary: King Newswire has launched an upgraded version of its press release distribution service. The updated service offers access to over 500 premium news outlets, including Yahoo Finance and Business Insider, and brings SEO advantages. The service supports various press release types, including product launches and business openings.

articles.title: The ultimate guide to niche clean skincare brands available in the UAE
articles.author: Aminath Ifasa
articles.summary: Cocokind delivers high-performance skincare with certified organic and natural ingredients, catering to all skin types. Forest Essentials blends ancient Indian beauty rituals with contemporary elegance, crafting products with ingredients like rose, saffron, and sandalwood. OSEA harnesses the power of sustainably harvested seaweed to create vegan, toxin-free skincare.

articles.title: Amazon's 'incredibly powerful' budget cordless vacuum is £45 off and 'better than Shark'
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: The Ultenic U16 Flex Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, a budget-friendly option, is on sale and features a 'tangle-free' brush, three suction modes, and up to 60 minutes of runtime. It includes a bendable tube for under-furniture cleaning and an LED display. Customer reviews highlight its power, ease of use, and effectiveness on various floor types.

articles.title: Jaecoo J6 review: Practical and rugged electric off-roader that's easy on the wallet, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Jaecoo, a sub-brand of Chinese carmaker Chery, is launching the Jaecoo J6, a fully electric SUV, in export markets like Singapore. The Jaecoo J6 is designed as a rugged off-roader with unique features such as a compartment for storing wet items, nine driving modes, and a 15.6-inch touchscreen, and is priced at $199,888 with COE (as of April 2025).

articles.title: Patanjali Ayurveda: Redefining natural healthcare for modern lifestyles
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Patanjali introduced a range of Ayurvedic products, including soaps, shampoos, herbal oils, and food items, which quickly gained popularity in India. These products are known for their natural ingredients and health benefits, offering alternatives to chemical-laden options in the market. Examples include 'Kesh Kanti Oil', 'Tejus Oil', 'Amla Juice' and Patanjali Aata.

articles.title: Xiaomi unveils must-have devices for April with new launches and special offers
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched two new products: the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G Sand Gold edition and the Redmi A5. These launches are part of Xiaomi's appreciation for its loyal fans, accompanied by deals and gifts.

articles.title: Crushon AI Enhances AI Girl Generator for NSFW AI Companion Chat
articles.summary: Crushon.AI announced elevated capabilities for its AI Girl Generator, designed for interactive, uncensored NSFW AI experiences. The updated AI Girl Generator employs 17+ large language models and expanded session memory. The platform also integrates new features to personalize interaction, offering users a dynamic and customizable AI companion.

articles.title: Walmart has *actually* good deals on top brands during its beauty sale
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Walmart is hosting a beauty sale starting April 18, featuring discounted prices on various products from brands like T3, Dyson, Sol de Janeiro, Olaplex, and Maybelline. The sale includes new pricing and features on items such as the T3 AireBrush hair dryer, Dyson Airwrap, Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Crush mist, and Maybelline Great Lash mascara, offering consumers access to these products at potentially reduced prices.

articles.title: Coupang and Zigzag enhance beauty events amid rising competition in Korea
articles.author: Choi Hyo-Jung
articles.summary: Coupang held its 'Mega Beauty Show' with custom lip balm making and product experience areas. Zigzag launched its first beauty show, offering product experiences and collaborations. CJ Olive Young plans to change its event format to an outdoor festival.

articles.title: LUMINESCE: Setting a New Benchmark in Natural Skincare and Light-Based Innovation
articles.author: Dennis Keller
articles.summary: LUMINESCE, a new skincare brand founded on May 17, 2024, has launched a product line combining light therapy with lymphatic drainage for enhanced skin wellness. The brand emphasizes natural ingredients and has achieved significant commercial success, selling over 150,000 units in under a year since its launch.

articles.title: NH Nonghyup Bank announced on the 18th that it held a briefing session on the launch of 'Project Neo..
articles.author: Han Sang-Heon
articles.summary: NH Nonghyup Bank has launched 'Project Neo' to reorganize its core banking with a focus on digital transformation. The project aims to innovate financial services and business processes, providing new financial experiences to customers and employees. The bank plans to establish a collaborative system and open the system in stages by 2029, with the goal of becoming a 'digital native bank'.

articles.title: If Your Bathroom Looks A Bit Questionable, These 30 Walmart Products Will Make It More Presentable
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Walmart is showcasing a wide range of new bathroom products, including accessories and cleaning supplies. The products range from soap pumps and organizers to shower steamers and toilet cleaning stamps, all with the aim of elevating the bathroom experience. Prices are also mentioned.

articles.title: ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra Review: Performance & AI Camera
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ASUS has launched the Zenfone 12 Ultra, its flagship smartphone for 2025, featuring advanced AI capabilities and a 6.78-inch Samsung E6 AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The company also introduced the ROG Phone 9 series, the newest iteration of its gaming-focused mobile devices.

articles.title: The 'stylish' £38 Next blouse that's 'a great addition to any work wardrobe'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Next is offering the Lipsy Zip Front Utility Pocket Blouse for £38 in white, black, and pink. The blouse, made from 100% polyester and available in sizes six to 18, features 3/4 sleeves, two utility pockets, and a metal zip.

articles.title: If It Feels Like Your Parents Skipped Out On Teaching Some Crucial Life Skills, These 30 Products Can Help
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new products available for purchase on Amazon, ranging from kitchen gadgets like the FryAway cooking oil solidifier to home improvement tools like the Go Hang It! picture hanging kit and cleaning solutions like the Wet & Forget shower cleaner. It also features innovative gadgets like the Thaw Claw for defrosting meat and the Dash rapid egg cooker, alongside everyday essentials like a compact first aid kit and a Downy fabric spray.

articles.title: RRD Debuts Iridio, a Unified Marketing Solution
articles.summary: RRD launched Iridio, a unified marketing solution, offering a composable service stack. This solution encompasses strategy, creative services, technology, data and analytics, and media execution, aiming to simplify marketing efforts by integrating core elements under one team.

articles.title: OpenAI launches Flex processing for cheaper, slower AI tasks
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching Flex processing, a new API option that provides lower AI model usage prices in exchange for slower response times and occasional resource unavailability. Flex processing is available in beta for OpenAIs recently released o3 and o4-mini reasoning models.

articles.title: Can We Trust Our Eyes Anymore? The Dark Side of Apple's New AI Clean Up Tool
articles.author: The Conversation
articles.summary: Apple introduced its 'Clean Up' feature, which utilizes generative AI for removing elements from photos. This feature is available to Apple customers with certain hardware and software capabilities in regions including Australia, New Zealand, Canada, and the United States. Google and Samsung offer similar features in their devices that lets users edit objects using AI.

articles.title: A premium portable pizza oven is the latest glamping perk
articles.author: LEBAWIT LILY GIRMA
articles.summary: Autocamp is launching a new service starting April 1st, providing Gozney Tread portable pizza ovens to guests at its Catskills and Joshua Tree locations.  Autocamp's newest location near Sequoia National Park will include a heated outdoor pool, event area, and bunkhouse accommodations. Autocamp is also known for selling S'mores kits in their locations.

articles.title: Ends soon: Get the onn Google TV Full HD Streaming Device for just $13
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: The 'onn Google TV Full HD Streaming Device' is a product. The product indicates news about introduction or launch of a new product.

articles.title: WAMCO Reinforces Need For Quality Dairy Nutrition
articles.author: Taiwo Hassan
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC, producers of Peak Milk, has introduced Peak Mini, a smaller and more affordable pack of their Peak evaporated milk. This new product aims to provide quality dairy nutrition to Nigerians at a budget-friendly price, ensuring that consumers no longer need to compromise on nutrition due to cost.

articles.title: Google's Pixel phones have come a long way in a relatively short amount of time
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 9a, a budget phone with features such as a 48-megapixel main shooter, a 13-megapixel ultrawide camera with macro, its Tensor G4 chip, and 8GB of RAM, available for $500.  The Pixel 9a is considered better than most Android phones and offers more value compared to the iPhone 16e. Google has also been iteratively improving the Pixel line with mid-cycle software updates.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - April 18, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci introduced the Baby Terry Cloth Hat With Web as part of their Cruise 2025 children's collection. The baby-sized bucket hat, priced at $310, features the archival Web stripe in green and red on a soft terry cloth material. It is designed to create a sporty look for children.

articles.title: Nintendo Announces Switch 2 Pre-Order Date in Late April: Here's How to Get Nintendo's New ...
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 is scheduled for release in early June. Pre-orders will begin later this month.

articles.title: Gen Z's Underground Social Network Just Went National and It's Blowing Up
articles.author: Ian Shepherd
articles.summary: Fizz, a hyperlocal app, has launched a new version that connects students across universities, resulting in a 50% increase in daily active users. The app is expanding beyond college campuses, aiming to provide a community for Gen Z, regardless of their enrollment status.

articles.title: Agentic AI And Building Connections With Customers
articles.author: Adrian Swinscoe
articles.summary: Qualtrics has launched Experience Agents, a new AI-powered product, designed to act autonomously on customer insights in real time.  These agents enhance customer experience by adapting survey questions based on responses and resolving issues immediately, offering personalized solutions, like complimentary lounge passes, based on feedback.

articles.title: Buried in Laundry?: Poplin comes to the rescue
articles.author: Karen Schaffner
articles.summary: Poplin, a laundry service app created by Mort Fertel, allows users to outsource their laundry by placing it outside their door for pickup and delivery. The service charges $1 per pound, includes free pickup and delivery, and guarantees clean, folded laundry returned in the correct color and undamaged. Poplin aims to improve the quality of life for both customers and laundry professionals (primarily stay-at-home moms) by simplifying the laundry process.

articles.title: The Boundless Innovation Of AI At The Innovate Summit
articles.summary: OpenAI released ChatGPT with capabilities to respond to prompts and produce detailed responses. Tech companies such as Google and Microsoft released their own versions as well. Companies like Amazon, Bank of America, H&M, and Tesla have implemented customer service chatbots.

articles.title: UK beauty brand Lyma's US sales beat forecasts amid tariff woes
articles.author: The Times/The Sunday Times
articles.summary: Lyma, a London-based company selling health supplements, luxury skincare products and laser beauty devices, is launching a new product in the American market.

articles.title: Marvel Rivals' New Costume Customization Is Fairly Priced, but There's a Problem
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A company is offering in-depth skin customization as a new feature, priced separately from existing "Units". The feature implies a new product or service aimed at providing users with enhanced customization options.

articles.title: Aldi tells shoppers 'run don't walk' as it reveals 'decadent' new frozen item
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Aldi announced exciting product launches.

articles.title: How a saucy newcomer is bringing fresh flavors to baked beans
articles.author: Faribault Foods
articles.summary: Saucy Spoon has grown from a test-market newcomer to a contender nationwide since its launch.
